root.name: Daria's Inferno
root.description: OverviewThe game takes place in the Town of Lawndale. Where Daria (the main character) Is falling asleep in her English high school class while reading the classic poem Dante's inferno. When she awakens she finds her self in her own personal hell, needing to retrieve five stolen items from the five circles of teenage hell--high school, the fashion mall, Degas Street (sort of a preppie hangout), your parent's home, and the principals office .
